text: Mbe simtɨga bakɨ guarara mben hɨgap guigira mben ndavir mparigi. Mbe mba tugen, mbe guigira fhɨrgerɨgap, wari ki. Mba tugen, Fhe Bakɨme mben kurigim, mbe guigira ndikndiga mbatɨga mbuav, mbe Zerusareman kav guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨkndɨgap, mben kurkurar zav ŋkɨɨa gum bigi ndiv phok bakɨme vhuigi.
